root.str: Adds 38 rounds to the default magazine size.

We're looking for front line fighters to fend off enemy vehicles and breach their fortifications. So, lock and load your rocket launcher, report to the nearest battle zone as a Heavy Assault, and work with your team to help push into enemy bases.



Must be Heavy Assault to complete objectives.
When inside a vehicle the Combat Medic will passively heal 10 health per second to allied soldiers within 5 meters.
<font color="#00FFAA">Foster:</font> More instability is occuring beneath the surface of Esamir, and Warpgates have had... operational issues since.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. All factions can use this decal.
The weapon fires a singular slug with increased damage and velocity, but rate of fire is slowed by 20%.
Created to further enhance the carbine's versatility, the TRAC-5 S can choose between multiple fire modes for firing at distant targets. TR use only.
The Proteus VE68's overclocked interface provides a superior rate of fire perfect for close quarters combat.
Killing an enemy while wielding a melee weapon restores 175 health. This effect does not trigger on quick melee attacks.
Apply the Indar Dunes camo pattern to your vehicle. All factions can use this gear.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.6 second.
Accept a mission to get started.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Lightning by 300 seconds.
During the month of October, get your favorite spooky items at a great price!
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.2 seconds.
Get the most popular Harasser weapons at a discounted price!
Reduces the acquire timer of the Galaxy down to 18.5 minutes.

Reduces damage taken from infantry small arms and vehicle machine guns by an additional 10%, explosions by an additional 38%, armor piercing machine guns by an additional 35%, and aircraft machine guns by an additional 37%. Reduced the bonus damage caused by C-4 by 100%.
Could not transfer fireteam leadership due to bad group.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 200 rounds.
Ambusher Jump Jets provide a quick burst of forward thrust, with limited vertical height and a 6 second cooldown between uses.
Failed to remove the squad from the platoon.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.5 seconds.
Reduces damage from small arms and heavy machine guns by 20%.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 48 grenades.
NS-357P Underboss Ribbon NS-357P Underboss Ribbon
This customization adds a TR Logo decal to the cockpit glass. TR use only.
Adds 4 rounds to the default magazine size.
Apply the single use Jungle Forest camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Reduces the nanite cost of ANT and Sunderer by 20%.
Turning this off will toggle off the active voice chat list. (Default: On)
Infuses the MAX with unstable energy for up to 20 seconds, increasing maximum damage output by 10% and movement speed slightly, but damage received is increased by 20%.
<font color="#00FFAA">FL-34: </font> See, friendo, that wasn't so bad.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 700 rounds.

<font color="#00FFAA">Praetor Umatherin:</font> What is a Veridian Genetics keycard doing all the way out here? Was one of the researchers a believer? You should return to the underground base immediately and see what it unlocks.

No longer functional, break down for ISO-4.
Regenerates 35 health per second when out of combat for 12 seconds.

NS Auraxium Holiday Hat.
+50% xp when worn
This item is only usable during the winter holiday season.
Apply the Thorn camo pattern to your armor. VS use only.
Rearming vehicles is automatic, you need only be near the resupply point.
TR Infiltrator Sniper Rifle Group Description
Activate to repair 15% of the vehicle health over 5 seconds. If the vehicle is on fire when activated, it will also immediately extinguish the flames. Can be activated once every 30 seconds.
Now 75 percent less likely to short circuit and explode! TR use only.
The vehicle terminal allows your empire to purchase vehicles. The vehicles appear in the courtyard.
You must rejoin the [*channel*] channel before speaking in it. /joinchannel for more information.
Photon A2A Missile Pods: Silver Medal

Activates a Repair Drone that hovers nearby. Friendly vehicles, equipment, and MAX units within 10 meters passively recover 46 health every second. 45 second cooldown.

Only one drone can be active at a time. Destroyed when you enter a vehicle. This item expires at the end of the Campaign.

BASTION COMPONENT
Reconstitutes structural integrity of the Bastion Fleet Carrier, and prepares it for orbital entry.
Requires Bastion Asset crafting permissions.

Required to summon Bastion Fleet Carrier.
Adds Lumifiber Trim to the Prowler. TR use only.
Customize your ground vehicle by adding a "S" Gold Hood Ornament.
<font color="#00FFAA">Malfunctioning Spy Drone:</font> Update, TerranTurboRanger. Download currently 30% complete. Continue to prevent interruptions.
Apply the Rock Lichen camo pattern to your armor. NC use only.
Apply the single use Indar Dry Ocean camo pattern to your armor. VS use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.1 seconds.
While piloting a vehicle, earn progress when your passengers kill enemies.
Applies a Crystal Camo pattern to your character. VS use only.
Further increases the Infiltrator's Control Console hacking speed.

The experimental Lasher X2 fires volatile orbs of plasma that explode on contact with hard surfaces. Field trials have demonstrated its effectiveness at suppressing fire, flushing out enemies and melting infantry. VS use only.
Restores health upon killing an enemy with a melee weapon.
Wearable by all non-Max classes. All factions can wear this item.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Grants access to a consumable medical kit that can be used to instantly restore the users health.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 350 rounds.
Reduces NMG's full recharge time to 20 seconds.
Increases the vehicle's total health pool by 23%.
Get the most popular Flash weapons at a discounted price!
Unlock and improve the Light Assault's jump jet abilities. Abilities can be equipped on the loadout screen.
Adds 10 rounds to the default magazine size.
NC6S Gauss SAW S: Copper Medal
The Rosewater ACOG is preferred during close to mid-range engagements. This optic amplifies magnification by 3.4x.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 300 rounds.
Reduces the movement speed penalty for crouching by 55%.

Increase the base 30% orbital strike damage resistance of the vehicle to 44% In addition, the vehicle is no longer affected by physics impulses from orbital strikes and other weaponized sources while undeployed.
Apply the single use Desert Scrub v1 camo pattern to your vehicle. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.

Toggle on to create Darius Shields around the rumble seats of the vehicle, protecting those passengers from direct fire. Damage done to shields drains power, shields will go down when toggled off or power reduced to zero. Power regenerates when shields are down and will regenerate to full within 35 seconds. Shields cannot be toggled back on until power reserve is greater than 25%

Reduces your passive shield recharge delay by 0.6 seconds, and whenever your shield breaks, your sprint speed is increased by 20% for 3.5 seconds. Taking damage will remove the added sprint speed. <font color="#dc9c36">12 second cooldown after triggering.</font>

While in an Electrical Storm, you can shunt excess tempest energy by converting it into fuel for turbo.

This item expires at the end of the Campaign.
You automatically repair 6% health every second. Damage disables repairs for 8 seconds.
Lethal and lightweight, the Mandate SX45 boasts incredible stopping power in a sidearm.
We have been notified of your recovery. Please continue retrieval operations for the time being.
Reduces the acquire timer of the Reaver by 120 seconds.
Gold Smiley Face Dead Hood Ornament
When spawned the vehicle will have 6500 cortium in the tank instead of 5000.
Apply the Indar Dunes camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.
Increases the maximum ammo capacity of the weapon by 120 rounds.
The enhanced zoom Lyra reflex provides clear vision in close engagements, and enough magnification to retain precision at medium range.
Apply the single use Sandy Scrub camo pattern to your armor. TR use only. Single use camo can only be applied to one loadout one time and must be used on this character.
Increases the time required for seeking weapons to establish a lock by 1 second and prevents the vehicle being auto detected on the mini-map.
<font color="#00FFAA">Representative Nalla:</font> According to our logs, you don't seem to be authorized to trade at this time.
Apply the Amerish Forest v2 camo pattern to your weapon. All factions can use this gear.

With the never-ending barrage of enemy troops at our forward bases, our squads are in dire need of ammunition. We're calling all Galaxy pilots to suit up, fly to contested areas, and resupply your squad on the front lines.
This continent is currently locked. Another continent must be locked to gain access.
When toggled on, you will not receive squad invites.
Nanites constantly repair damage over time at a rate of 4% every 5 seconds. Damage disables auto repair for 12 seconds.
Travel to the new anomaly in northeastern Esamir.
For these threats you have to use rocket launchers and other more powerful ordnance.
Applies a decal to your vehicle. TR use only.
Rocket Launcher. Use this to deal heavy damage to vehicles.

USE
Claim rewards from Coordinator Tolland on Sanctuary.

DESCRIPTION
Requires Expedition Asset crafting permissions.

Charter an expedition to gather 30 Polystellarite for your Outfit Armory.

Only ONE resource expedition may be active at a time.

Trades 20 Polystellarite for 88 Synthium.

Uses resources in the Outfit Armory.
Decreases the time taken to reload weapon by 0.36 seconds.
Unlock the PMG-200 with a full complement of attachments. For NSO use only.
We need tank operators in the field to counter the enemy's armor. Grab a Vanguard and turn their tanks to scrap metal.
Decreases the turrets cool down period after each shot to 5.25 seconds.
Although war has become no less brutal since the era of this helmet's namesake, it has become decidedly less messy. VS use only.
